thread.section_title: iQ Hotel Roma - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Highly recommend!
thread.title_full: Highly recommend! - Review of iQ Hotel Roma, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Natalia_Fraser
title: Highly recommend!
text:
My husband and I stayed in this hotel with our son ( under 2). Quick and easy check-in, very friendly staff, clean and spacious room ( exactly what we needed with a toddler who has far too much energy!) with good air conditioning. Breakfast was delicious with plenty of choice - extra points for fresh orange juice and high chairs available. Again, staff made us feel very welcomed and every morning greeted my son by his name which is always a nice touch. We would definitely stay in IQ again.
Room Tip: We've stayed in room 114, which was absolutely perfect for family 2+1 See more room tips
